Address.value: 10880 WILSHIRE BOULEVARD,SUITE 2150, LOS ANGELES, California, 90024, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Puma Biotechnology Inc is a biopharmaceutical company with a focus on the development and commercialization of innovative products to enhance cancer care. The company in-licenses the global development and commercialization rights to PB272 (neratinib, oral), PB272 (neratinib, intravenous) and PB357.
